“Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and

LearnKey, Inc., is a premier global provider of  providing students/learners, teachers and counselors with employability skills training solutions. For three decades our mission has been to "Improve Employability Every Day", through flexible expert learning solutions -  that work for everyone because they are not only easy to use, but they are aligned to in-demand career and job ready skills.  Here are seven (7) reasons why organizations do business with us:•	Improving In-demand skills: Over 250 courses that cover the most relevant job readiness skills for today’s in demand jobs and career advancement.•	Getting Certified: Our courseware covers and maps to globally recognized industry certifications  (i.e. Microsoft, Adobe, Cisco, IC3, CompTIA, etc.).  •	Thirty (30) years of producing video based courseware: Longer than any of our competitors.•	More than just video tutorials: Robust assessments, projects, interactive labs, workbooks and in-depth coverage of objectives.•	Proven methodology for online learning: So your time is well spent learning, practicing and retaining.•	Industry Approved: By Certiport, a leading globally recognized certifying body. •	Superior customer success: Proven through providing thousands of customers successful on-boarding, technical support, tutoring, career pathway mapping and job & career readiness services.

recommendations: Kris Pascua
Account Director at Convergys, Inc.
February 6, 2012, Kris reported directly to Jeff

Jeff is one of the best bosses I ever had.  He is certainly a man of vision and has so much energy and passion around doing right by the client and making certain we're easy to do business with.  He's extremely supportive of my work and ideas, very generous with praise where deserved and he has always shared his two cents and guidance for opportunities I may have not considered. He has always approached caring for his team pretty much like a family and has a balanced way of engaging with us on both a professional and personal level.  He is a mentor, friend and at time when you need it, a life coach.  If you're looking for someone who is resourceful with a very positive outlook, the can-do attitude, and the courage to set sail towards your company's true north, Jeff's certainly the leader whom you can trust to bring that to your team.

Andres Phippard
VP Caribbean and Latin America at Ibex Global
February 18, 2017, Jeff reported directly to Andres

At Stream Global Services I reported to Andres for over two years and during that time his operations expertise, leadership, mentoring and developmental skills made a huge impact on my career. One of the first clients he assigned me to required strong operations experience in providing service delivery (i.e. tech support, voice, chat, etc.) across multiple countries. While I had strong call center experience before, it was Andres who took the time to invest in the areas I needed to get up to speed with right away. He earns the trust of his people through hard work and the expectation of perfection which results in clients trusting his leadership as we were able to not only retain this customer, year over year, but successfully grow the business due to exceeding score card results on a quarterly basis. Excellent leader.

summary: High energy executive in focused on delivering learning solutions that improve students employability through customized online learning solutions. Our focus is helping teachers, counselors, schools, social services organizations and students through Career Technology Education (CTE)  programs as well as veterans by leveraging our online learning products that are proven to help students improve their employability.   Strong focus on IT & Job Ready programs, SkillBadges, certifications in Microsoft Office & MTA, IC3, Adobe, Cisco, Windows server, CompTIA and many more.  Additionally possess over twenty-five (25) years of operations experience in: contact centers, business development and sales of integrated software & services. Proven ability to facilitate change through the redesign of internal operating and business processes, applications and policies by implementing over twenty (20) Six Sigma projects focused on cost savings, cost avoidance and incremental revenue exceeding over $200M to companies bottom line. With a unique blend of large (fortune 100) and small early stage corporate experience my strength is working with companies in the areas of: building productive teams, develop and implement strategic initiatives and or "innovative out of the box" ideas that have achieved successful market share, scaled revenues and "first to market" entry for sports media, software technology and travel products. Strong presentation and negotiation skills at C level and expertise at building productive and overachieving operations & sales teams through innovative processes and time proven tools used in identifying talent for the right job fit.
name: Jeff Coruccini, Employability Champion
title: CEO:  Employability Learning Solutions for Schools, Career Counselors, Teachers and students
